text: Julius Vytautas Briedis (27 August 1940 â€“ 22 September 2019) was a Lithuanian rower. He finished fifth and third at the 1964 and 1968 Summer Olympics.Vytautas Briedis at Sports Reference Briedis died on 22 September 2019 in Vilnius. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Lithuanian sportspeople Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Rowers
